component.description: An optional component (or list of components) to fetch (or all if not specified)

filter.description: Package query filter that is applied to packages in the mirror

filter_with_deps.description: When filtering, include dependencies of matching packages as well

force_architectures.description: Skip check that requested architectures are listed in Release file

force_components.description: Skip check that requested architectures are listed in Release file

ignore_signatures.description: Disable verification of Release file signatures

keyring.description: GPG keyring(s) to use when verifying Release file

max_tries.description: Max download tries till process fails with download error

with_installer.description: Download additional not packaged installer files

with_sources.description: Download source packages in addition to binary packages

architectures.description: List of architectures to consider (or all available if not specified)

dep_follow_all_variants.description: When processing dependencies, follow a & b if dependency is 'a|b'

dep_follow_source.description: When processing dependencies, follow from binary to Source packages

aptly_binary_path.description: Location of the `aptly` binary if not in PATH
